name: HaikuReader
0:
”Alexa open haiku reader”
”Ask haiku reader to tell me a haiku”
”Tell haiku reader to read me a haiku”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: haiku reader
des: Delightful, humorous or thought provoking haikus dished out to you randomly. To hear a poem, simply say "Ask haiku reader for a haiku" or "Tell haiku reader to give me a poem".
